title: Bi-normal trajectories in the Circular Restricted Three-Body Problem
abstract:
In this note, we show there exist infinitely many trajectories which are
bi-normal (i.e. normal at initial and final times) to the xz-plane, in the
Spatial Circular Restricted Three-Body Problem, for energies below or slightly
above the first critical value and near the primaries, under the assumption of
the twist condition as defined by Moreno-van-Koert in arXiv:2011.06562. This is
an application of the relative Poincar\'e-Birkhoff theorem for Lagrangians in
Liouville domains, as proven by the authors in arXiv:2408.06919.
